::Rampage::
Greven's missiles smash into his shoulder, messing up his 
swinging at Epyon.


On 6 Apr 2001, at 4:41, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Incarcinator/Scyther/Greven::
> 
> Killfest looks at the battle before him as he approaches, his addon
> jetpack blazing at full. This time it had enough fuel to probably last
> the battle. On his way here, he had discovered that flying rather
> agreed with him.
> 
> "You know who to kill," he says to his troops behind him, quickly
> picking out a target. His EMP rifle fires four shots at Shockwave. Two
> optic blasts and two signature seeking missiles follow afterward, at
> the same target.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer roars, running forward. His shoulder mounted missile
> launchers aim at Vehement, each one firing two missiles.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise charges past EndBringer, seeing Flesh Ripper. He also roars,
> charging the bot with amazing speed.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Incarcinator looks down at the battle below. He was very high in the
> air. Taking out his large gun, he aims down at Unitron. He pulls the
> trigger twice, sending two explosive shells down at Unitron.
> 
> The speed of the shells caused them to burn slightly while going down
> toward Unitron. The gun was designed to fire extrodinary fast bullets.
> The last time Incarcinator had shot this gun, the shell had gone
> through a Maximal shuttle and destroyed it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther approaches the battle, cloaked. He activates his scanners,
> wanting to detect any cloaked bots, if there were any here.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven watches his teammates rush into battle and follows, taking out
> both his missile launcher. He fires three missiles at Rampage, all of
> them heat seeking.
> 
> 
>
